item.text: Bright and early the next morning Joshua and the Israelites left Shittim and came to the Jordan. They camped there before crossing the river.

<st data-num="01961 07097">After</st> <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> the <st data-num="07860" class="">leaders</st> <st data-num="05674" class="">went</st> <st data-num="07130" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st>
and commanded the people: “When you see the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God being carried by the Levitical priests, you must leave here and walk behind it.
But stay about 3,000 feet behind it. Keep your distance so you can see which way you should go, for you have not traveled this way before.”
Joshua told the people, “Ritually consecrate yourselves, for tomorrow the Lord will perform miraculous deeds among you.”
Joshua told the priests, “Pick up the ark of the covenant and pass on ahead of the people.” So they picked up the ark of the covenant and went ahead of the people.
The Lord told Joshua, “This very day I will begin to honor you before all Israel, so they will know that I am with you just as I was with Moses.
Instruct the priests carrying the ark of the covenant, ‘When you reach the bank of the Jordan River, wade into the water.’”
Joshua told the Israelites, “Come here and listen to the words of the Lord your God!”

<st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">continued</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is how you will <st data-num="03045 03588">know</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">living</st> <st data-num="0410" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="07130" class="">among</st> you and that he will <st data-num="03423" class="">truly</st> <st data-num="03423" class="">drive out</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you the <st data-num="03669" class="">Canaanites</st>, <st data-num="02850" class="">Hittites</st>, <st data-num="02340" class="">Hivites</st>, <st data-num="06522" class="">Perizzites</st>, <st data-num="01622" class="">Girgashites</st>, <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorites</st>, and <st data-num="02983" class="">Jebusites</st>.

<st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>! The <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of the <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> of the <st data-num="0136" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> is ready to <st data-num="05674" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">ahead of</st> you.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">select</st> for yourselves <st data-num="08147 06240">12</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> from the <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, <st data-num="0376 0259">one</st> <st data-num="0259 07626">per tribe</st>.
When the feet of the priests carrying the ark of the Lord, the Lord of the whole earth, touch the water of the Jordan, the water coming downstream toward you will stop flowing and pile up.”
So when the people left their tents to cross the Jordan, the priests carrying the ark of the covenant went ahead of them.

When the ones <st data-num="05375" class="">carrying</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="0935 05704">reached</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st>, and the <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st> of the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">carrying</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="02881" class="">touched</st> the <st data-num="07097" class="">surface</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>—(the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> <st data-num="04390 05921 03605 01415">is at flood stage</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> during <st data-num="07105" class="">harvest</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st>)<n id="2" />—

the <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="03381 04605">coming downstream toward</st> them <st data-num="05975" class="">stopped flowing</st>.<n id="1" /> It <st data-num="06965 05067 0259">piled up</st> <st data-num="07368 03966">far</st> upstream<n id="2" /> at <st data-num="0121" class="">Adam</st> (the <st data-num="05892 0834">city</st> <st data-num="06654" class="">near</st> <st data-num="06891" class="">Zarethan</st>); there <st data-num="03772" class="">was no</st> water <st data-num="08552" class="">at all</st> <st data-num="03381" class="">flowing</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st> of the <st data-num="06160" class="">rift valley</st> (the <st data-num="04417" class="">Salt</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea)</st>.<n id="3" /> The <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="05674" class="">crossed</st> the river <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> <st data-num="03405" class="">Jericho</st>.<n id="4" />
The priests carrying the ark of the covenant of the Lord stood firmly on dry ground in the middle of the Jordan. All Israel crossed over on dry ground until the entire nation was on the other side.
